name: フランドール・スカーレット/芙兰朵露·斯卡蕾特/Flandre Scarlet - Touhou Project
description:
芙兰朵露·斯卡蕾特的LoRA模型。推荐权重为1，以下为辅助提示词：

The LoRA model of Flandre Scarlet. The recommended weight is 1. Here are supplementary prompts:

flandre scarlet, white soft hat, red hat bow, blonde hair, side ponytail, red eyes, shiny eyes, fang, red vest, short sleeves, puffy sleeves, yellow ascot, red frilled skirt, crystal wings, bobby socks, mary janes, red shoes,

——————————————————————

经测试，有若干大模型可以直接画出十分标准的芙兰，lora的作用无非是帮助你在各类大模型上都能准确画出芙兰。

该lora在anything v3，AOAOKO [PVC Style Model]，aom3等模型上的表现很好，推荐使用这些大模型。

According to my test, some checkpoints at very good at drawing Flandre without lora. So this lora is merely helpful to draw her more accurately on other checkpoints which are not so good at it.

I recommend using this lora with anything v3, AOAOKO [PVC Style Model] and AOM3. They perform really well with this lora.
